CustomField.description: If checked, case email attachments will be moved to Amazon S3 only when case will be closed. Reopen of that case will import S3 files back to Salesforce.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, case email attachments will be moved to Amazon S3 only when case will be closed. Reopen of that case will import S3 files back to Salesforce.
CustomField.label: Export Closed Cases Email Attachments
